events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineering position.
The candidate’s application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster for further evaluation.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the software developer candidate’s recruitment process efficiently.
Initial phone screening with the candidate was completed successfully, showing strong knowledge in software development.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next stage of the technical interview.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team for the candidate next week.
The candidate completed the technical coding interview with favorable feedback on problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture alignment and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was completed and the candidate demonstrated a positive attitude towards company values.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate including details of salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer and is preparing for onboarding.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has commenced with orientation and technical setup.
The recruitment case for the software developer role has been successfully closed with candidate hire confirmed.
